description: User account 'admin@company.com' experienced 47 failed authentication attempts from multiple suspicious IP addresses within 5 minutes. The attack originated from known VPN exit nodes (185.220.101.45) in different geographic locations (Russia). Account lockout policy triggered after 5 failed attempts, but attacker continued with credential stuffing attempts using different user agents (Mozilla, curl, python-requests). Known credential stuffing infrastructure detected.
alert_name: Multiple Failed Login Attempts - Brute Force Attack Detected
